mutants.original_line: consonant_list = [c for c in text if c in consonants]
mutants.mutated_line: consonant_list = [c for c in text if c not in consonants]

mutants.original_line: output = [consonant_list.pop() if c in consonants else c for c in text]
mutants.mutated_line: output = [consonant_list.pop() if c not in consonants else c for c in text]
